duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare quarterly and annual financial statements for filing with the SEC and coordinate the Edgar and XBRL process.
Assist the Manager of External Financial Reporting during the review of documents filed with the SEC and other regulatory agencies.
Prepare materials for full working group and disclosure committee meetings.
Coordinate financial information for external and internal auditors.
Ensure proper execution of SOX key controls.
Review the company’s benefit plan and foreign subsidiaries’ statutory financial statements for special projects and ad hoc requests.
Perform other job-related duties assigned by supervisor or management.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate business degree in Accounting (MBA, master’s degree considered a plus)
Certified Public Accountant (CPA) in active and good standing or in process and eligible to take the CPA examination.
